Title: NONOGRAM
SelectRequest: Press number you want to select.
ExplSpace: Space or Z : Fill the cell
ExplX: X : Check the cell that is supposed to be blank
ExplEnter: Enter(create mode) : Save the map that player creates
ExplEsc: Esc : Get out of current game/display
ThankYouMsg: I wish you enjoy this game!
ReqMapName: Write map name that you want to create
MapSizeError: Value should not be more than
